tasks.name: Document system boundaries and planning assumptions
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: `docs/architecture/system-boundaries.md` captures scope, `.codemachine/artifacts/plan.md` references the doc, and `docs/architecture/assumptions.md` logs new assumptions with timestamps.

tasks.name: Automate repository validation workflows
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Validation script exists in `scripts/ci/validate.sh`, npm `validate` script calls it, and `docs/architecture/README.md` documents the workflow.

tasks.name: Define configuration schema and environment template
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Environment schema lives in `src/config/schema/environment.schema.ts`, `.env.example` lists required variables, and docs explain configuration.
